thread.title: The Gresso 3310 Is a Nokia 3310 for Rich People
thread.title_full: The Gresso 3310 Is a Nokia 3310 for Rich People

author: Graeme Campbell
title: The Gresso 3310 Is a Nokia 3310 for Rich People
text:
Upon its unveiling, Nokia’s resurrected 3310 handset was billed as a no-frills, cheap alternative to the saturated smartphone market which placed function over form. Now, Swiss-based luxury phone manufacturer Gresso has taken the idea and run with it, having just unveiled a $3,000 version of their own.
Already lionized for its near-indestructible qualities, Gresso has reinforced the phone even further with a grade-five titanium finish, meaning it can withstand drops from as high as 32 feet. Additional features include 32GB of built-in storage and a 3MP rear camera.
Only 3310 models of the phone will be produced. To find out more head on over to the Gresso website .
Staying with things for rich people, Tinder has been operating an exclusive “ elite users ” version.
